Title: The New Lars
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Raven Molisee, Paul Villeco, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Lamar Abrams, Zach Callison, Reagan Gomez-Preston, Nancy Linari
Plot: Steven tries to make the best of waking up in the body of Lars.
